data.eml:eml: Loboschiza Diakonoff (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae) from Thailand with descriptions of four new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anan, Surachet, Dokchan, Paradorn, Pinkaew, Nantasak (2016): Loboschiza Diakonoff (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae) from Thailand with descriptions of four new species. Zootaxa 4109 (1): 81-88, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4109.1.7
